title: Death.to.Spies.Gold.Edition.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Death.to.Spies.Gold.Edition.Repack-R.G.Mechanics





Release Info:

Death to Spies





Year: 2007
Genre: Stealth Action
Developer: Haggard Games
Publisher: Haggard Games
Publication Type: Repack
Game Language: Eng |Rus
Voice Language: Eng |Rus
CrACK: RELOADED




System Requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
Processor: Intel Pentium 4 1.7 GHz or AMD Athlon 1.8 GHz
(Intel Pentium 4 2.4 GHz or AMD Athlon 2.4 GHz or higher +
Memory: 512 MB
Video Card: NVIDIA GeForce 5200 / ATI Radeon 9500 with 128 MB
RAM or higher (recommended NVIDIA GeForce 6800 /
ATI Radeon X800 with 256 MB RAM or greater)
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX 9.0
Free space on hard disk: 3.12 GB
To start the game on modern operating systems
requires a compatibility mode with older.

Game information:

April 9, 1943 at the People's Commissariat of Defense of
the USSR created General Directorate of Military
Counterintelligence "Smersh". The objectives of the
structure was part of the fight against reconnaissance
and sabotage activities of foreign, and
especially fascist secret services.

Zafrontovoy intelligence and counterintelligence work
operatives engaged in the 4th Division GUK "SMERSH".
They have seen the most difficult and dangerous tasks:
espionage, counter-espionage, sabotage, setting,
abduction and elimination of VIPs opponent.

Game "Death to Spies" tells about the hard life of
these people. Learn how to forge victory on an invisible
front, on the example of the military way of Seeds
Strogova, the captain of the 4th Division Intelligence.

Game Features:

Stealth-action from a third person, which tells about
the activities of the most mysterious secret services
of the Second World War.
Assignments based on historical facts and information
about special operations declassified military intelligence.
A complete set of security services operative techniques:
dressing up, throwing knives, silent destruction of the
enemy, the enemy distraction, breaking doors, setting
booby traps, conducting covert surveillance and recording.
Ability to manage a variety of vehicles.


Death to Spies: Moment of Truth



Year: 2009
Genre: Stealth Action
Developer: Haggard Games
Publisher: 1C-SoftClub
Publication Type: Repack
Game Language: Eng |Rus
Voice Language: Eng |Rus
cRACK: PROPHET



System Requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP, Windows Vista,
Windows 7, Windows 8
Processor: Intel Dual Core processor with a
clock frequency of 2 GHz or AMD Athlon 4000+
Memory: 1 GB for XP, 2 GB for Vista +
Video: 256 MB of graphics memory, 100%
compatible with DirectX 9.0c.
ATI Radeon X800, Nvidia Geforce 6800
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectXÃ‚Â® 9.0
Free space on hard disk: 3.34 GB

Game information:

Moment of truth - the moment of receipt of the information
captured by an agent to facilitate the capture of the entire
group being sought and the full realization of the case;
more broadly - to provide information to facilitate
the establishment of the truth.
Vladimir Bogomolov, "The Moment of Truth (In August, forty-four)."
Top Secret. February 29, 1944. Stavka - Chief GAM SMERSH.
Staff quarters of the main department of military SMERSH
counterintelligence Strogoff Semyon, proven best side in
the first domestic spy thriller (in the intercepted
cryptogram designated as stealth-action), the command
is sent again to participate in a number of complex operations
under the code name "Death to Spies: Moment the truth. "
We believe that strict has all the qualities necessary for
the performance of highly dangerous task of collecting
information about the locations of military and civilian
objects of the enemy, as well as to counter and eradicate
the enemy agents and representatives of the Wehrmacht high command.
Personal order of the Supreme Commander Strogovu, passed
serious training in a special training center, ordered to
proceed immediately to implement the top-secret missions.
Its mission - to capture spies and saboteurs and get
comprehensive information about their actions using unique
technologies and special equipment.

Repack Features:

Death to Spies

Do not cut / recoded

Death to Spies: Moment of Truth

Do not cut / recoded
